meanings.definition: The state or quality of being creepy.
meanings.sent1: The crepiness of the old abandoned house sent shivers down my spine.
meanings.sent2: The crepiness of the dark forest made me feel uneasy.
meanings.sent3: The crepiness of the Halloween decorations made the children giggle nervously.
meanings.sent4: The crepiness of the fog enveloped the town like a sinister cloak.
meanings.sent5: The crepiness of the ghost story lingered in the air long after it was told.

meanings.definition: A feeling of unease or fear caused by something eerie or unsettling.
meanings.sent1: Walking through the graveyard at night, I couldn't shake off the crepiness in the air.
meanings.sent2: The crepiness of the horror movie kept me on edge throughout the night.
meanings.sent3: The crepiness of the strange noise outside turned out to be just a cat knocking over a trash can.
meanings.sent4: The crepiness of the abandoned amusement park was like a silent scream in the darkness.
meanings.sent5: The crepiness of the shadowy figure lurking in the alley made my heart race with fear.
